1 """
2 Python Package to detect contours on images of color markers and return
3 a list of color information based on the locations of the marker
4 """
5 
6 
7 
8 import cv2 as cv
9 import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
10 import numpy as np
11 
12 def detect_contour(img0,grid_size = (1,3),pixel_size = [475,125], starting_pixel = [125,200]):
13  """
14  Divides the image into grids, blurs the image using Gaussian Function, provides a bounding box on the image
15  and returns an image with contours
16 
17  Args:
18  img0 : OpenCV Image
19  grid_size : size of the Grid for the image
20  pixel_size : size of the bounding box
21  starting_pixel : reference starting coordinate for the bounding box
22 
23  Returns:
24  img0 : Processed Image with contours
25  grid : 2D array of HSV values
26 
27  """
28  grid = np.zeros((grid_size[0],grid_size[1],3), np.uint8)
29  img = cv.GaussianBlur(img0, (5, 5), 2)
30  hsv = cv.cvtColor(img, cv.COLOR_BGR2HSV)
31 
32  lower_thresh = np.array([0,100,20])
33  upper_thresh = np.array([180,255,255])
34  mask = cv.inRange(hsv, lower_thresh, upper_thresh)
35  contours, hierarchy = cv.findContours(mask, cv.RETR_TREE, cv.CHAIN_APPROX_NONE)
36  x_interval = pixel_size[0]/grid_size[1]
37  y_interval = pixel_size[1]/grid_size[0]
38  cs = []
39  for contour in contours:
40  area = cv.contourArea(contour)
41  if area > 500:
42  M = cv.moments(contour)
43  cv.drawContours(img0,contour,-1,(0,255,0),3)
44  cx = int(M['m10']/M['m00'])
45  cy = int(M['m01']/M['m00'])
46  c = [cx,cy]
47  c = np.subtract(c,starting_pixel)
48  gx = int(c[0]//x_interval)
49  gy = int(c[1]//y_interval)
50  grid[gy,gx] = hsv[cy,cx]
51  cs.append(c)
52  cv.rectangle(img0,starting_pixel,np.add(starting_pixel,pixel_size),(0,0,255),3)
53 
54  return img0, grid
55 
56 def detect_contour2(img0,grid_size,pixel_size, starting_pixel, lower_thresh,upper_thresh):
57  """
58  Divides the image into grids, blurs the image using Gaussian Function, provides a bounding box on the image
59  and returns an image with contours
60 
61  Args:
62  img0 : OpenCV Image
63  grid_size : size of the Grid for the image
64  pixel_size : size of the bounding box
65  starting_pixel : reference starting coordinate for the bounding box
66 
67  Returns:
68  img0 : Processed Image with contours
69  grid : list of 9 H values
70 
71  """
72 
73  list_H = []
74  img0 = img0[starting_pixel[1]:starting_pixel[1]+pixel_size[1],starting_pixel[0]:starting_pixel[0]+pixel_size[0]]
75  grid_len = grid_size[0]*grid_size[1]
76  grid = np.zeros((grid_size[0],grid_size[1],3), np.uint8)
77  img = cv.GaussianBlur(img0, (7,7), 2)
78  img_hsv = cv.cvtColor(img, cv.COLOR_BGR2HSV)
79  # lower_thresh = np.array([6,60,60])
80  # upper_thresh = np.array([180,255,255])
81  mask = cv.inRange(img_hsv, lower_thresh, upper_thresh)
82  contours, hierarchy = cv.findContours(mask, cv.RETR_TREE, cv.CHAIN_APPROX_NONE)
83  x_interval = pixel_size[0]/grid_size[1]
84  y_interval = pixel_size[1]/grid_size[0]
85  cs = []
86  for contour in contours:
87  area = cv.contourArea(contour)
88  if area > 1500:
89  M = cv.moments(contour)
90  cv.drawContours(img0,contour,-1,(0,255,0),3)
91  cx = int(M['m10']/M['m00'])
92  cy = int(M['m01']/M['m00'])
93  c = [cx,cy]
94  # c = np.subtract(c,starting_pixel)
95  gx = int(c[0]//x_interval)
96  gy = int(c[1]//y_interval)
97  cx = cx +(gx-1)*20
98  cy = cy +(gy-1)*20
99  if gx == 1 and gy == 1:
100  cx+=10
101  cy+=10
102  # if img_hsv[cy,cx][0]<= 9:
103  # continue
104  cv.circle(img0, (cx,cy), 3, (255,0,0), 2)
105  grid[gy,gx] = img_hsv[cy,cx]
106  cs.append(c)
107  grid = grid.reshape(1,grid_len,3)[0]
108  for hsv in grid:
109  list_H.append(hsv[0])
110  list_H.reverse()
111  return img0, list_H
112 
113 def detect(img0):
114  """
115  A function to detect the contours of marker images based on a specific
116  HSV range
117 
118  Args:
119  img0 : The original openCV image data
120 
121  Returns:
122  img0 : The processed openCV image with contours drawing on it
123  """
124  img = cv.GaussianBlur(img0, (7, 7), 2)
125  hsv = cv.cvtColor(img, cv.COLOR_BGR2HSV)
126 
127  lower_thresh = np.array([6,100,20])
128  upper_thresh = np.array([180,255,255])
129  mask = cv.inRange(hsv, lower_thresh, upper_thresh)
130  contours, hierarchy = cv.findContours(mask, cv.RETR_TREE, cv.CHAIN_APPROX_NONE)
131  if len(contours)!=0:
132  for contour in contours:
133  area = cv.contourArea(contour)
134  if area > 500:
135  cv.drawContours(img0,contour,-1,(0,255,0),3)
136 
137  return img0

140 def plot_image(filename):
141  """
142  Helper Function to print values for image at each location
143 
144  Args:
145  filename : OpenCV Image
146  """
147  img = cv.imread(filename)
148  plt.imshow(cv.cvtColor(img, cv.COLOR_BGR2RGB))
149  plt.show()
